115@SuppressWarnings("unused")
116public class BlockEventListener implements Listener {
117
118    private static final Set<Material> PISTONS = Set.of(
119            Material.PISTON,
120            Material.STICKY_PISTON
121    );
122    private static final Set<Material> PHYSICS_BLOCKS = Set.of(
123            Material.TURTLE_EGG,
124            Material.TURTLE_SPAWN_EGG
125    );
126    private static final Set<Material> SNOW = Stream.of(Material.values()) // needed as Tag.SNOW isn't present in 1.16.5
127            .filter(material -> material.name().contains("SNOW"))
128            .filter(Material::isBlock)
129            .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableSet());
130
131    private final PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager;
132    private final WorldEdit worldEdit;
133
134    @Inject
135    public BlockEventListener(final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager, final @NonNull WorldEdit worldEdit) {
136        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
137        this.worldEdit = worldEdit;
138    }
139
140    public static void sendBlockChange(final org.bukkit.Location bloc, final BlockData data) {
141        TaskManager.runTaskLater(() -> {
142            String world = bloc.getWorld().getName();
143            int x = bloc.getBlockX();
144            int z = bloc.getBlockZ();
145            int distance = Bukkit.getViewDistance() * 16;
146
147            for (final PlotPlayer<?> player : PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayers()) {
148                Location location = player.getLocation();
149                if (location.getWorldName().equals(world)) {
150                    if (16 * Math.abs(location.getX() - x) / 16 > distance || 16 * Math.abs(location.getZ() - z) / 16 > distance) {
151                        continue;
152                    }
153                    ((BukkitPlayer) player).player.sendBlockChange(bloc, data);
154                }
155            }
156        }, TaskTime.ticks(3L));
157    }
158
159    @EventHandler
160    public void onRedstoneEvent(BlockRedstoneEvent event) {
161        Block block = event.getBlock();
162        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
163        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
164        if (area == null) {
165            return;
166        }
167        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
168        if (plot == null) {
169            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, RedstoneFlag.class, false)) {
170                event.setNewCurrent(0);
171            }
172            return;
173        }
174        if (!plot.getFlag(RedstoneFlag.class)) {
175            event.setNewCurrent(0);
176            plot.debug("Redstone event was cancelled because redstone = false");
177            return;
178        }
179        if (Settings.Redstone.DISABLE_OFFLINE) {
180            boolean disable = false;
181            if (!DBFunc.SERVER.equals(plot.getOwner())) {
182                if (plot.isMerged()) {
183                    disable = true;
184                    for (UUID owner : plot.getOwners()) {
185                        if (PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(owner) != null) {
186                            disable = false;
187                            break;
188                        }
189                    }
190                } else {
191                    disable = PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(plot.getOwnerAbs()) == null;
192                }
193            }
194            if (disable) {
195                for (UUID trusted : plot.getTrusted()) {
196                    if (PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayerIfExists(trusted) != null) {
197                        disable = false;
198                        break;
199                    }
200                }
201                if (disable) {
202                    event.setNewCurrent(0);
203                    plot.debug("Redstone event was cancelled because no trusted player was in the plot");
204                    return;
205                }
206            }
207        }
208        if (Settings.Redstone.DISABLE_UNOCCUPIED) {
209            for (final PlotPlayer<?> player : PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayers()) {
210                if (plot.equals(player.getCurrentPlot())) {
211                    return;
212                }
213            }
214            event.setNewCurrent(0);
215        }
216    }
217
218    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
219    public void onPhysicsEvent(BlockPhysicsEvent event) {
220        Block block = event.getBlock();
221        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
222        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
223        if (area == null) {
224            return;
225        }
226        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlotAbs(location);
227        if (plot == null) {
228            return;
229        }
230        if (event.getChangedType().hasGravity() && plot.getFlag(DisablePhysicsFlag.class)) {
231            event.setCancelled(true);
232            sendBlockChange(event.getBlock().getLocation(), event.getBlock().getBlockData());
233            plot.debug("Prevented block physics and resent block change because disable-physics = true");
234            return;
235        }
236        if (event.getChangedType() == Material.COMPARATOR) {
237            if (!plot.getFlag(RedstoneFlag.class)) {
238                event.setCancelled(true);
239                plot.debug("Prevented comparator update because redstone = false");
240            }
241            return;
242        }
243        if (PHYSICS_BLOCKS.contains(event.getChangedType())) {
244            if (plot.getFlag(DisablePhysicsFlag.class)) {
245                event.setCancelled(true);
246                plot.debug("Prevented block physics because disable-physics = true");
247            }
248            return;
249        }
250        if (Settings.Redstone.DETECT_INVALID_EDGE_PISTONS) {
251            if (PISTONS.contains(block.getType())) {
252                org.bukkit.block.data.Directional piston = (org.bukkit.block.data.Directional) block.getBlockData();
253                final BlockFace facing = piston.getFacing();
254                location = location.add(facing.getModX(), facing.getModY(), facing.getModZ());
255                Plot newPlot = area.getOwnedPlotAbs(location);
256                if (!plot.equals(newPlot)) {
257                    event.setCancelled(true);
258                    plot.debug("Prevented piston update because of invalid edge piston detection");
259                }
260            }
261        }
262    }
263
264    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
265    public void blockCreate(BlockPlaceEvent event) {
266        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
267        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
268        if (area == null) {
269            return;
270        }
271        Player player = event.getPlayer();
272        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
273        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
274        if (plot != null) {
275            if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(pp, location.getY())) {
276                event.setCancelled(true);
277                return;
278            }
279            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
280                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
281                    pp.sendMessage(
282                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
283                            Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED))
284                    );
285                    event.setCancelled(true);
286                    return;
287                }
288            } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
289                List<BlockTypeWrapper> place = plot.getFlag(PlaceFlag.class);
290                if (place != null) {
291                    Block block = event.getBlock();
292                    if (place.contains(
293                            BlockTypeWrapper.get(BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType())))) {
294                        return;
295                    }
296                }
297                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
298                    pp.sendMessage(
299                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
300                            Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER))
301                    );
302                    event.setCancelled(true);
303                    plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not place " + event.getBlock().getType()
304                            + " because of the place = false");
305                    return;
306                }
307            } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
308                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
309                    pp.sendMessage(
310                            TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
311                    );
312                    event.setCancelled(true);
313                    return;
314                }
315            }
316            if (plot.getFlag(DisablePhysicsFlag.class)) {
317                Block block = event.getBlockPlaced();
318                if (block.getType().hasGravity()) {
319                    sendBlockChange(block.getLocation(), block.getBlockData());
320                    plot.debug(event.getBlock().getType()
321                            + " did not fall because of disable-physics = true");
322                }
323            }
324        } else if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
325            pp.sendMessage(
326                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
327                    Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
328            );
329            event.setCancelled(true);
330        }
331    }
332
333    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOWEST)
334    public void blockDestroy(BlockBreakEvent event) {
335        Player player = event.getPlayer();
336        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
337        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
338        if (area == null) {
339            return;
340        }
341        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
342        if (plot != null) {
343            BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
344            // == rather than <= as we only care about the "ground level" not being destroyed
345            if (event.getBlock().getY() == area.getMinGenHeight()) {
346                if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_GROUNDLEVEL)) {
347                    plotPlayer.sendMessage(
348                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
349                            Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_GROUNDLEVEL))
350                    );
351                    event.setCancelled(true);
352                    return;
353                }
354            } else if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(plotPlayer, location.getY())) {
355                event.setCancelled(true);
356                return;
357            }
358            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
359                if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED, true)) {
360                    event.setCancelled(true);
361                }
362                return;
363            }
364            if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
365                List<BlockTypeWrapper> destroy = plot.getFlag(BreakFlag.class);
366                Block block = event.getBlock();
367                final BlockType blockType = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
368                for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : destroy) {
369                    if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(blockType)) {
370                        return;
371                    }
372                }
373                if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
374                    return;
375                }
376                plotPlayer.sendMessage(
377                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
378                        Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER))
379                );
380                event.setCancelled(true);
381            } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
382                if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
383                    plotPlayer.sendMessage(
384                            TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
385                    );
386                    event.setCancelled(true);
387                    return;
388                }
389            }
390            return;
391        }
392        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
393        if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)) {
394            return;
395        }
396        if (this.worldEdit != null && pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
397            if (player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand().getType() == Material
398                    .getMaterial(this.worldEdit.getConfiguration().wandItem)) {
399                return;
400            }
401        }
402        pp.sendMessage(
403                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
404                Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD))
405        );
406        event.setCancelled(true);
407    }
408
409    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
410    public void onBlockSpread(BlockSpreadEvent event) {
411        Block block = event.getBlock();
412        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
413        if (location.isPlotRoad()) {
414            event.setCancelled(true);
415            return;
416        }
417        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
418        if (area == null) {
419            return;
420        }
421        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
422        if (plot == null) {
423            return;
424        }
425        switch (event.getSource().getType().toString()) {
426            case "GRASS_BLOCK":
427                if (!plot.getFlag(GrassGrowFlag.class)) {
428                    plot.debug("Grass could not grow because grass-grow = false");
429                    event.setCancelled(true);
430                }
431                break;
432            case "MYCELIUM":
433                if (!plot.getFlag(MycelGrowFlag.class)) {
434                    plot.debug("Mycelium could not grow because mycel-grow = false");
435                    event.setCancelled(true);
436                }
437                break;
438            case "WEEPING_VINES":
439            case "TWISTING_VINES":
440            case "CAVE_VINES":
441            case "VINE":
442            case "GLOW_BERRIES":
443                if (!plot.getFlag(VineGrowFlag.class)) {
444                    plot.debug("Vine could not grow because vine-grow = false");
445                    event.setCancelled(true);
446                }
447                break;
448            case "KELP":
449                if (!plot.getFlag(KelpGrowFlag.class)) {
450                    plot.debug("Kelp could not grow because kelp-grow = false");
451                    event.setCancelled(true);
452                }
453            case "BUDDING_AMETHYST":
454                if (!plot.getFlag(CropGrowFlag.class)) {
455                    plot.debug("Amethyst clusters could not grow because crop-grow = false");
456                    event.setCancelled(true);
457                }
458                break;
459        }
460    }
461
462    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
463    public void onCauldronEmpty(CauldronLevelChangeEvent event) {
464        Entity entity = event.getEntity();
465        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
466        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
467        if (area == null) {
468            return;
469        }
470        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
471        // TODO Add flags for specific control over cauldron changes (rain, dripstone...)
472        switch (event.getReason()) {
473            case BANNER_WASH, ARMOR_WASH, EXTINGUISH -> {
474                if (entity instanceof Player player) {
475                    BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
476                    if (plot != null) {
477                        if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
478                            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
479                                return;
480                            }
481                        } else if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
482                            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
483                                return;
484                            }
485                        } else {
486                            return;
487                        }
488                    } else {
489                        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
490                            return;
491                        }
492                        if (this.worldEdit != null && plotPlayer.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
493                            if (player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand().getType() == Material
494                                    .getMaterial(this.worldEdit.getConfiguration().wandItem)) {
495                                return;
496                            }
497                        }
498                    }
499                }
500                if (event.getReason() == CauldronLevelChangeEvent.ChangeReason.EXTINGUISH && event.getEntity() != null) {
501                    event.getEntity().setFireTicks(0);
502                }
503                // Though the players fire ticks are modified,
504                // the cauldron water level change is cancelled and the event should represent that.
505                event.setCancelled(true);
506            }
507            default -> {
508                // Bucket empty, Bucket fill, Bottle empty, Bottle fill are already handled in PlayerInteract event
509                // Evaporation or Unknown reasons do not need to be cancelled as they are considered natural causes
510            }
511        }
512    }
513
514    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
515    public void onBlockForm(BlockFormEvent event) {
516        if (event instanceof EntityBlockFormEvent) {
517            return; // handled below
518        }
519        Block block = event.getBlock();
520        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
521        if (location.isPlotRoad()) {
522            event.setCancelled(true);
523            return;
524        }
525        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
526        if (area == null) {
527            return;
528        }
529        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
530        if (plot == null) {
531            return;
532        }
533        if (!area.buildRangeContainsY(location.getY())) {
534            event.setCancelled(true);
535            return;
536        }
537        if (SNOW.contains(event.getNewState().getType())) {
538            if (!plot.getFlag(SnowFormFlag.class)) {
539                plot.debug("Snow could not form because snow-form = false");
540                event.setCancelled(true);
541            }
542            return;
543        }
544        if (Tag.ICE.isTagged(event.getNewState().getType())) {
545            if (!plot.getFlag(IceFormFlag.class)) {
546                plot.debug("Ice could not form because ice-form = false");
547                event.setCancelled(true);
548            }
549        }
550    }
551
552    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
553    public void onEntityBlockForm(EntityBlockFormEvent event) {
554        String world = event.getBlock().getWorld().getName();
555        if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(world)) {
556            return;
557        }
558        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
559        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
560        if (area == null) {
561            return;
562        }
563        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
564        if (plot == null) {
565            event.setCancelled(true);
566            return;
567        }
568        Class<? extends BooleanFlag<?>> flag;
569        if (SNOW.contains(event.getNewState().getType())) {
570            flag = SnowFormFlag.class;
571        } else if (Tag.ICE.isTagged(event.getNewState().getType())) {
572            flag = IceFormFlag.class;
573        } else {
574            return;
575        }
576        boolean allowed = plot.getFlag(flag);
577        Entity entity = event.getEntity();
578        if (entity instanceof Player player) {
579            BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
580            if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
581                if (allowed) {
582                    return; // player is not added but forming <flag> is allowed
583                }
584                plot.debug(String.format(
585                        "%s could not be formed because %s = false (entity is player)",
586                        event.getNewState().getType(),
587                        flag == SnowFormFlag.class ? "snow-form" : "ice-form"
588                ));
589                event.setCancelled(true); // player is not added and forming <flag> isn't allowed
590            }
591            return; // event is cancelled if not added and not allowed, otherwise forming <flag> is allowed
592        }
593        if (plot.hasOwner()) {
594            if (allowed) {
595                return;
596            }
597            plot.debug(String.format(
598                    "%s could not be formed because %s = false (entity is not player)",
599                    event.getNewState().getType(),
600                    flag == SnowFormFlag.class ? "snow-form" : "ice-form"
601            ));
602            event.setCancelled(true);
603        }
604    }
605
606    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
607    public void onBlockDamage(BlockDamageEvent event) {
608        Player player = event.getPlayer();
609        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
610        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
611        if (area == null) {
612            return;
613        }
614        if (player.getGameMode() != GameMode.SURVIVAL) {
615            return;
616        }
617        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
618        if (plot != null) {
619            if (plot.getFlag(InstabreakFlag.class)) {
620                Block block = event.getBlock();
621                BlockBreakEvent call = new BlockBreakEvent(block, player);
622                Bukkit.getServer().getPluginManager().callEvent(call);
623                if (!call.isCancelled()) {
624                    event.getBlock().breakNaturally();
625                }
626            }
627            // == rather than <= as we only care about the "ground level" not being destroyed
628            if (location.getY() == area.getMinGenHeight()) {
629                event.setCancelled(true);
630                return;
631            }
632            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
633                BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
634                if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
635                    return;
636                }
637                event.setCancelled(true);
638                return;
639            }
640            BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
641            if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
642                List<BlockTypeWrapper> destroy = plot.getFlag(BreakFlag.class);
643                Block block = event.getBlock();
644                if (destroy
645                        .contains(BlockTypeWrapper.get(BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType())))
646                        || plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
647                    return;
648                }
649                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not break " + block.getType()
650                        + " because it was not in the break flag");
651                event.setCancelled(true);
652                return;
653            }
654            return;
655        }
656        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
657        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)) {
658            return;
659        }
660        event.setCancelled(true);
661    }
662
663    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
664    public void onFade(BlockFadeEvent event) {
665        Block block = event.getBlock();
666        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
667        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
668        if (area == null) {
669            return;
670        }
671        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
672        if (plot == null) {
673            event.setCancelled(true);
674            return;
675        }
676        Material blockType = block.getType();
677        if (Tag.ICE.isTagged(blockType)) {
678            if (!plot.getFlag(IceMeltFlag.class)) {
679                plot.debug("Ice could not melt because ice-melt = false");
680                event.setCancelled(true);
681            }
682            return;
683        }
684        if (SNOW.contains(blockType)) {
685            if (!plot.getFlag(SnowMeltFlag.class)) {
686                plot.debug("Snow could not melt because snow-melt = false");
687                event.setCancelled(true);
688            }
689            return;
690        }
691        if (blockType == Material.FARMLAND) {
692            if (!plot.getFlag(SoilDryFlag.class)) {
693                plot.debug("Soil could not dry because soil-dry = false");
694                event.setCancelled(true);
695            }
696            return;
697        }
698        if (Tag.CORAL_BLOCKS.isTagged(blockType) || Tag.CORALS.isTagged(blockType) || Tag.WALL_CORALS.isTagged(blockType)) {
699            if (!plot.getFlag(CoralDryFlag.class)) {
700                plot.debug("Coral could not dry because coral-dry = false");
701                event.setCancelled(true);
702            }
703        }
704    }
705
706    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
707    public void onChange(BlockFromToEvent event) {
708        Block fromBlock = event.getBlock();
709
710        // Check liquid flow flag inside of origin plot too
711        final Location fromLocation = BukkitUtil.adapt(fromBlock.getLocation());
712        final PlotArea fromArea = fromLocation.getPlotArea();
713        if (fromArea != null) {
714            final Plot fromPlot = fromArea.getOwnedPlot(fromLocation);
715            if (fromPlot != null && fromPlot.getFlag(LiquidFlowFlag.class) == LiquidFlowFlag.FlowStatus.DISABLED && event
716                    .getBlock()
717                    .isLiquid()) {
718                fromPlot.debug("Liquid could not flow because liquid-flow = disabled");
719                event.setCancelled(true);
720                return;
721            }
722        }
723
724        Block toBlock = event.getToBlock();
725        Location toLocation = BukkitUtil.adapt(toBlock.getLocation());
726        PlotArea toArea = toLocation.getPlotArea();
727        if (toArea == null) {
728            if (fromBlock.getType() == Material.DRAGON_EGG && fromArea != null) {
729                event.setCancelled(true);
730            }
731            return;
732        }
733        if (!toArea.buildRangeContainsY(toLocation.getY())) {
734            event.setCancelled(true);
735            return;
736        }
737        Plot toPlot = toArea.getOwnedPlot(toLocation);
738
739        if (fromBlock.getType() == Material.DRAGON_EGG && fromArea != null) {
740            final Plot fromPlot = fromArea.getOwnedPlot(fromLocation);
741
742            if (fromPlot != null || toPlot != null) {
743                if ((fromPlot == null || !fromPlot.equals(toPlot)) && (toPlot == null || !toPlot.equals(fromPlot))) {
744                    event.setCancelled(true);
745                    return;
746                }
747            }
748        }
749
750        if (toPlot != null) {
751            if (!toArea.contains(fromLocation.getX(), fromLocation.getZ()) || !Objects.equals(toPlot, toArea.getOwnedPlot(fromLocation))) {
752                event.setCancelled(true);
753                return;
754            }
755            if (toPlot.getFlag(LiquidFlowFlag.class) == LiquidFlowFlag.FlowStatus.ENABLED && event.getBlock().isLiquid()) {
756                return;
757            }
758            if (toPlot.getFlag(DisablePhysicsFlag.class)) {
759                toPlot.debug(event.getBlock().getType() + " could not update because disable-physics = true");
760                event.setCancelled(true);
761                return;
762            }
763            if (toPlot.getFlag(LiquidFlowFlag.class) == LiquidFlowFlag.FlowStatus.DISABLED && event.getBlock().isLiquid()) {
764                toPlot.debug("Liquid could not flow because liquid-flow = disabled");
765                event.setCancelled(true);
766            }
767        } else if (!toArea.contains(fromLocation.getX(), fromLocation.getZ()) || !Objects.equals(null, toArea.getOwnedPlot(fromLocation))) {
768            event.setCancelled(true);
769        } else if (event.getBlock().isLiquid()) {
770            final org.bukkit.Location location = event.getBlock().getLocation();
771
772            /*
773                X = block location
774                A-H = potential plot locations
775               Z
776               ^
777               |    A B C
778               o    D X E
779               |    F G H
780               v
781                <-----O-----> x
782             */
783            if (BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(-1, 0, 1)  /* A */).getPlot() != null
784                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(1, 0, 0)   /* B */).getPlot() != null
785                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(1, 0, 1)   /* C */).getPlot() != null
786                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(-1, 0, 0)  /* D */).getPlot() != null
787                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(1, 0, 0)   /* E */).getPlot() != null
788                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(-1, 0, -1) /* F */).getPlot() != null
789                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(0, 0, -1)  /* G */).getPlot() != null
790                    || BukkitUtil.adapt(location.clone().add(1, 0, 1)   /* H */).getPlot() != null) {
791                event.setCancelled(true);
792            }
793        }
794    }
795
796
797    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
798    public void onGrow(BlockGrowEvent event) {
799        Block block = event.getBlock();
800        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
801
802        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
803        if (area == null) {
804            return;
805        }
806
807        if (!area.buildRangeContainsY(location.getY())) {
808            event.setCancelled(true);
809            return;
810        }
811
812        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
813        if (plot == null || !plot.getFlag(CropGrowFlag.class)) {
814            if (plot != null) {
815                plot.debug("Crop grow event was cancelled because crop-grow = false");
816            }
817            event.setCancelled(true);
818        }
819    }
820
821    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
822    public void onBlockPistonExtend(BlockPistonExtendEvent event) {
823        Block block = event.getBlock();
824        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
825        BlockFace face = event.getDirection();
826        Vector relative = new Vector(face.getModX(), face.getModY(), face.getModZ());
827        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
828        if (area == null) {
829            if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(location.getWorldName())) {
830                return;
831            }
832            for (Block block1 : event.getBlocks()) {
833                Location bloc = BukkitUtil.adapt(block1.getLocation());
834                if (bloc.isPlotArea() || bloc
835                        .add(relative.getBlockX(), relative.getBlockY(), relative.getBlockZ())
836                        .isPlotArea()) {
837                    event.setCancelled(true);
838                    return;
839                }
840            }
841            if (location.add(relative.getBlockX(), relative.getBlockY(), relative.getBlockZ()).isPlotArea()) {
842                // Prevent pistons from extending if they are: bordering a plot
843                // area, facing inside plot area, and not pushing any blocks
844                event.setCancelled(true);
845            }
846            return;
847        }
848        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
849        if (plot == null) {
850            event.setCancelled(true);
851            return;
852        }
853        for (Block block1 : event.getBlocks()) {
854            Location bloc = BukkitUtil.adapt(block1.getLocation());
855            Location newLoc = bloc.add(relative.getBlockX(), relative.getBlockY(), relative.getBlockZ());
856            if (!area.contains(bloc.getX(), bloc.getZ()) || !area.contains(newLoc)) {
857                event.setCancelled(true);
858                return;
859            }
860            if (!plot.equals(area.getOwnedPlot(bloc)) || !plot.equals(area.getOwnedPlot(newLoc))) {
861                event.setCancelled(true);
862                return;
863            }
864            if (!area.buildRangeContainsY(bloc.getY()) || !area.buildRangeContainsY(newLoc.getY())) {
865                event.setCancelled(true);
866                return;
867            }
868        }
869        if (!plot.equals(area.getOwnedPlot(location.add(relative.getBlockX(), relative.getBlockY(), relative.getBlockZ())))) {
870            // This branch is only necessary to prevent pistons from extending
871            // if they are: on a plot edge, facing outside the plot, and not
872            // pushing any blocks
873            event.setCancelled(true);
874        }
875    }
876
877    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
878    public void onBlockPistonRetract(BlockPistonRetractEvent event) {
879        Block block = event.getBlock();
880        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
881        BlockFace face = event.getDirection();
882        Vector relative = new Vector(face.getModX(), face.getModY(), face.getModZ());
883        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
884        if (area == null) {
885            if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(location.getWorldName())) {
886                return;
887            }
888            for (Block block1 : event.getBlocks()) {
889                Location bloc = BukkitUtil.adapt(block1.getLocation());
890                Location newLoc = bloc.add(relative.getBlockX(), relative.getBlockY(), relative.getBlockZ());
891                if (bloc.isPlotArea() || newLoc.isPlotArea()) {
892                    event.setCancelled(true);
893                    return;
894                }
895            }
896            return;
897        }
898        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
899        if (plot == null) {
900            event.setCancelled(true);
901            return;
902        }
903        for (Block block1 : event.getBlocks()) {
904            Location bloc = BukkitUtil.adapt(block1.getLocation());
905            Location newLoc = bloc.add(relative.getBlockX(), relative.getBlockY(), relative.getBlockZ());
906            if (!area.contains(bloc.getX(), bloc.getZ()) || !area.contains(newLoc)) {
907                event.setCancelled(true);
908                return;
909            }
910            if (!plot.equals(area.getOwnedPlot(bloc)) || !plot.equals(area.getOwnedPlot(newLoc))) {
911                event.setCancelled(true);
912                return;
913            }
914            if (!area.buildRangeContainsY(bloc.getY()) || !area.buildRangeContainsY(newLoc.getY())) {
915                event.setCancelled(true);
916                return;
917            }
918        }
919    }
920
921    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
922    public void onBlockDispense(BlockDispenseEvent event) {
923        if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(event.getBlock().getWorld().getName())) {
924            return;
925        }
926        Material type = event.getItem().getType();
927        switch (type.toString()) {
928            case "SHULKER_BOX", "WHITE_SHULKER_BOX", "ORANGE_SHULKER_BOX", "MAGENTA_SHULKER_BOX", "LIGHT_BLUE_SHULKER_BOX",
929                    "YELLOW_SHULKER_BOX", "LIME_SHULKER_BOX", "PINK_SHULKER_BOX", "GRAY_SHULKER_BOX", "LIGHT_GRAY_SHULKER_BOX",
930                    "CYAN_SHULKER_BOX", "PURPLE_SHULKER_BOX", "BLUE_SHULKER_BOX", "BROWN_SHULKER_BOX", "GREEN_SHULKER_BOX",
931                    "RED_SHULKER_BOX", "BLACK_SHULKER_BOX", "CARVED_PUMPKIN", "WITHER_SKELETON_SKULL", "FLINT_AND_STEEL",
932                    "BONE_MEAL", "SHEARS", "GLASS_BOTTLE", "GLOWSTONE", "COD_BUCKET", "PUFFERFISH_BUCKET", "SALMON_BUCKET",
933                    "TROPICAL_FISH_BUCKET", "AXOLOTL_BUCKET", "BUCKET", "WATER_BUCKET", "LAVA_BUCKET", "TADPOLE_BUCKET" -> {
934                if (event.getBlock().getType() == Material.DROPPER) {
935                    return;
936                }
937                BlockFace targetFace = ((Dispenser) event.getBlock().getBlockData()).getFacing();
938                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getRelative(targetFace).getLocation());
939                if (location.isPlotRoad()) {
940                    event.setCancelled(true);
941                    return;
942                }
943                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
944                if (area != null && !area.buildRangeContainsY(location.getY())) {
945                    event.setCancelled(true);
946                }
947            }
948        }
949    }
950
951    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
952    public void onStructureGrow(StructureGrowEvent event) {
953        if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(event.getWorld().getName())) {
954            return;
955        }
956        List<org.bukkit.block.BlockState> blocks = event.getBlocks();
957        if (blocks.isEmpty()) {
958            return;
959        }
960        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blocks.get(0).getLocation());
961        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
962        if (area == null) {
963            for (int i = blocks.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
964                location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blocks.get(i).getLocation());
965                if (location.isPlotArea()) {
966                    blocks.remove(i);
967                }
968            }
969            return;
970        } else {
971            Plot origin = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
972            if (origin == null) {
973                event.setCancelled(true);
974                return;
975            }
976            for (int i = blocks.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
977                location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blocks.get(i).getLocation());
978                if (!area.contains(location.getX(), location.getZ())) {
979                    blocks.remove(i);
980                    continue;
981                }
982                Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
983                if (!Objects.equals(plot, origin)) {
984                    event.getBlocks().remove(i);
985                    continue;
986                }
987                if (!area.buildRangeContainsY(location.getY())) {
988                    event.getBlocks().remove(i);
989                }
990            }
991        }
992        Plot origin = area.getPlot(location);
993        if (origin == null) {
994            event.setCancelled(true);
995            return;
996        }
997        for (int i = blocks.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
998            location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blocks.get(i).getLocation());
999            Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
1000            /*
1001             * plot  the base plot of the merged area
1002             * origin  the plot where the event gets called
1003             */
1004
1005            // Are plot and origin different AND are both plots merged
1006            if (!Objects.equals(plot, origin) && (!plot.isMerged() && !origin.isMerged())) {
1007                event.getBlocks().remove(i);
1008            }
1009        }
1010    }
1011
1012    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1013    public void onBigBoom(BlockExplodeEvent event) {
1014        Block block = event.getBlock();
1015        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1016        String world = location.getWorldName();
1017        if (!this.plotAreaManager.hasPlotArea(world)) {
1018            return;
1019        }
1020        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1021        if (area == null) {
1022            Iterator<Block> iterator = event.blockList().iterator();
1023            while (iterator.hasNext()) {
1024                location = BukkitUtil.adapt(iterator.next().getLocation());
1025                if (location.isPlotArea()) {
1026                    iterator.remove();
1027                }
1028            }
1029            return;
1030        }
1031        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
1032        if (plot == null || !plot.getFlag(ExplosionFlag.class)) {
1033            event.setCancelled(true);
1034            if (plot != null) {
1035                plot.debug("Explosion was cancelled because explosion = false");
1036            }
1037        }
1038        event.blockList().removeIf(blox -> !plot.equals(area.getOwnedPlot(BukkitUtil.adapt(blox.getLocation()))));
1039    }
1040
1041    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1042    public void onBlockBurn(BlockBurnEvent event) {
1043        Block block = event.getBlock();
1044        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1045
1046        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1047        if (area == null) {
1048            return;
1049        }
1050
1051        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1052        if (plot == null || !plot.getFlag(BlockBurnFlag.class)) {
1053            if (plot != null) {
1054                plot.debug("Block burning was cancelled because block-burn = false");
1055            }
1056            event.setCancelled(true);
1057        }
1058
1059    }
1060
1061    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1062    public void onBlockIgnite(BlockIgniteEvent event) {
1063        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1064        Entity ignitingEntity = event.getIgnitingEntity();
1065        Block block = event.getBlock();
1066        BlockIgniteEvent.IgniteCause igniteCause = event.getCause();
1067        Location location1 = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1068        PlotArea area = location1.getPlotArea();
1069        if (area == null) {
1070            return;
1071        }
1072        if (igniteCause == BlockIgniteEvent.IgniteCause.LIGHTNING) {
1073            event.setCancelled(true);
1074            return;
1075        }
1076
1077        Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(location1);
1078        if (player != null) {
1079            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1080            if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(pp, location1.getY())) {
1081                event.setCancelled(true);
1082                return;
1083            }
1084            if (plot == null) {
1085                if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, BlockIgnitionFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1086                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD
1087                )) {
1088                    pp.sendMessage(
1089                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1090                            Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1091                    );
1092                    event.setCancelled(true);
1093                }
1094            } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1095                if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, BlockIgnitionFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1096                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED
1097                )) {
1098                    pp.sendMessage(
1099                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1100                            Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED))
1101                    );
1102                    event.setCancelled(true);
1103                }
1104            } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1105                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1106                    pp.sendMessage(
1107                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1108                            Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER))
1109                    );
1110                    event.setCancelled(true);
1111                }
1112            } else if (!plot.getFlag(BlockIgnitionFlag.class)) {
1113                event.setCancelled(true);
1114                plot.debug("Block ignition was cancelled because block-ignition = false");
1115            }
1116        } else {
1117            if (plot == null) {
1118                event.setCancelled(true);
1119                return;
1120            }
1121            if (ignitingEntity != null) {
1122                if (!plot.getFlag(BlockIgnitionFlag.class)) {
1123                    event.setCancelled(true);
1124                    plot.debug("Block ignition was cancelled because block-ignition = false");
1125                    return;
1126                }
1127                if (igniteCause == BlockIgniteEvent.IgniteCause.FIREBALL) {
1128                    if (ignitingEntity instanceof Fireball) {
1129                        Projectile fireball = (Projectile) ignitingEntity;
1130                        Location location = null;
1131                        if (fireball.getShooter() instanceof Entity shooter) {
1132                            location = BukkitUtil.adapt(shooter.getLocation());
1133                        } else if (fireball.getShooter() instanceof BlockProjectileSource) {
1134                            Block shooter =
1135                                    ((BlockProjectileSource) fireball.getShooter()).getBlock();
1136                            location = BukkitUtil.adapt(shooter.getLocation());
1137                        }
1138                        if (location != null && !plot.equals(location.getPlot())) {
1139                            event.setCancelled(true);
1140                        }
1141                    }
1142                }
1143
1144            } else if (event.getIgnitingBlock() != null) {
1145                Block ignitingBlock = event.getIgnitingBlock();
1146                Plot plotIgnited = BukkitUtil.adapt(ignitingBlock.getLocation()).getPlot();
1147                if (igniteCause == BlockIgniteEvent.IgniteCause.FLINT_AND_STEEL && (
1148                        !plot.getFlag(BlockIgnitionFlag.class) || plotIgnited == null || !plotIgnited
1149                                .equals(plot)) || (igniteCause == BlockIgniteEvent.IgniteCause.SPREAD
1150                        || igniteCause == BlockIgniteEvent.IgniteCause.LAVA) && (
1151                        !plot.getFlag(BlockIgnitionFlag.class) || plotIgnited == null || !plotIgnited
1152                                .equals(plot))) {
1153                    event.setCancelled(true);
1154                }
1155            }
1156        }
1157    }
1158
1159    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1160    public void onLeavesDecay(LeavesDecayEvent event) {
1161        Block block = event.getBlock();
1162        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1163
1164        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1165        if (area == null) {
1166            return;
1167        }
1168
1169        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1170        if (plot == null || !plot.getFlag(LeafDecayFlag.class)) {
1171            if (plot != null) {
1172                plot.debug("Leaf decaying was cancelled because leaf-decay = false");
1173            }
1174            event.setCancelled(true);
1175        }
1176
1177    }
1178
1179    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true)
1180    public void onSpongeAbsorb(SpongeAbsorbEvent event) {
1181        Block sponge = event.getBlock();
1182        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(sponge.getLocation());
1183        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1184        List<org.bukkit.block.BlockState> blocks = event.getBlocks();
1185        if (area == null) {
1186            blocks.removeIf(block -> BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation()).isPlotArea());
1187        } else {
1188            Plot origin = area.getOwnedPlot(location);
1189            blocks.removeIf(block -> {
1190                Location blockLocation = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1191                if (!area.contains(blockLocation.getX(), blockLocation.getZ())) {
1192                    return true;
1193                }
1194                Plot plot = area.getOwnedPlot(blockLocation);
1195                if (!Objects.equals(plot, origin)) {
1196                    return true;
1197                }
1198                return !area.buildRangeContainsY(location.getY());
1199            });
1200        }
1201        if (blocks.isEmpty()) {
1202            // Cancel event so the sponge block doesn't turn into a wet sponge
1203            // if no water is being absorbed
1204            event.setCancelled(true);
1205        }
1206    }
1207
1208    /*
1209     * BlockMultiPlaceEvent is called unrelated to the BlockPlaceEvent itself and therefore doesn't respect the cancellation.
1210     */
1211    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
1212    public void onBlockMultiPlace(BlockMultiPlaceEvent event) {
1213        // Check if the generic block place event would be cancelled
1214        blockCreate(event);
1215        if (event.isCancelled()) {
1216            return;
1217        }
1218
1219        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1220        Location placedLocation = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlockReplacedState().getLocation());
1221        PlotArea area = placedLocation.getPlotArea();
1222        if (area == null) {
1223            return;
1224        }
1225        Plot plot = placedLocation.getPlot();
1226
1227        for (final BlockState state : event.getReplacedBlockStates()) {
1228            Location currentLocation = BukkitUtil.adapt(state.getLocation());
1229            if (!pp.hasPermission(
1230                    Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD
1231            ) && !(Objects.equals(currentLocation.getPlot(), plot))) {
1232                pp.sendMessage(
1233                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1234                        Template.of("node", String.valueOf(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1235                );
1236                event.setCancelled(true);
1237                break;
1238            }
1239            if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(pp, currentLocation.getY())) {
1240                event.setCancelled(true);
1241                break;
1242            }
1243        }
1244    }
1245
1246}
